Extension Manager is a powerful tool that enhances your browsing experience by providing easy control over your browser extensions. With Extension Manager, you can effortlessly enable or disable extensions, as well as organize them into groups for better management.

Key Features:

Enable/Disable Extensions: Quickly toggle the activation status of your extensions with just a click. Easily turn extensions on or off according to your needs, providing you with greater control over your browsing environment.

Group Management: Organize your extensions into groups to streamline your browsing experience. Group similar extensions together for easier access and management. Whether it's organizing extensions by function, category, or usage frequency, Extension Manager allows you to customize your extension setup to suit your browsing habits.

User-Friendly Interface: Extension Manager offers an intuitive and user-friendly interface, making it easy for users of all levels to manage their extensions effectively. Accessible controls and clear visuals ensure a smooth experience, allowing you to focus on what matters most â€“ your browsing.

Customizable Settings: Tailor Extension Manager to meet your specific needs with customizable settings. Adjust preferences such as default group settings, sorting options, and more to personalize your extension management experience.
